definitions.definition: ( chiefly as a combining form ) A similar sandwich or patty .
examples: She was planning to have a burger for dinner.

definitions.definition: ( Australia , Fiji , India , Ireland , New Zealand , South Africa , UK ) Any sandwich that uses two bread rolls or buns (in North America it only refers to a sandwich with two buns or bread rolls and a meat patty).
( Pakistan , usually derogatory ) A stereotypical well-off Pakistani aspiring to a westernized lifestyle .
( Internet slang , 4chan slang , derogatory ) An American .

secondary_definitions: ( chiefly as a combining form ) A similar sandwich or patty .

( Australia , Fiji , India , Ireland , New Zealand , South Africa , UK ) Any sandwich that uses two bread rolls or buns (in North America it only refers to a sandwich with two buns or bread rolls and a meat patty).
( Pakistan , usually derogatory ) A stereotypical well-off Pakistani aspiring to a westernized lifestyle .
( Internet slang , 4chan slang , derogatory ) An American .
